title: Worst app ever
text:
Pairing with iPhone/pad - takes forever. Do NOT upgrade! Features that were there last year were taken away. Not my idea of an improvement, plus, you are right back to step one.
App rarely opens to the home page and there is no way to get out of ‚Äúlooking for strand‚Äù page, so, if you want to turn it on or off, put on your slippers, you will be heading outside.

title: Nice lights
text:
This is our second year to put these up. They are well made and very beautiful. We have fun changing our custom scenes almost daily and there are plenty of different effects. 

Please PLEASE bring back the timer function and the music feature. We chose these lights over other brands specifically because of the ‚Äúdancing lights‚Äù capability. That was truly special.

text: We really liked these lights. But that was mainly because we could set them to music. They are basic, boring lights now that I can‚Äôt put them to music.

title: Removed on / off timer - awful
text:
Other than changing colors the on / off timer feature in the app was the best part.  For some unknown reason they removed the the on / off timer... now you have to individually connect and turn on each strand at night and turn off each strand before bed.  A conventional timer and extension cords may work like normal lights but... wait for it... THESE LIGHTS ARE RIDICULOUSLY EXPENSIVE!! 
(Note to developer: put the timer back)

title: Meh
text: I'm not impressed. The Ui of the app is pretty unfriendly. It says I can share light settings with friends but for the life of me I can't figure out how. The music thing doesn't really do much other than a solid color that changes every now and then and fades in and out with the volume. It would be nice if I could change what the pattern of colors was and how fast they change. In an upbeat song I want them to change quickly and they don't. And you can't leave the app, or even turn off the screen and have it still play. The color picker is laughable since the color on the screen won't look anything like the shade the lights are. Overall, it's cool, but a waste of money.

title: Doesn‚Äôt Do the One Thing It‚Äôs Supposed To Do
text: I‚Äôve been using the App Store for as long as it has existed, and this is the first time I‚Äôve felt compelled to write a review. This app is awful. It actually got worse during the past year of updates. Last Christmas, the interface was pretty bad but at least it worked. But now, with the same three strands of lights, I can‚Äôt even turn them on reliably anymore! And, the interface hasn‚Äôt improved at all and in some ways is inferior to previous versions. This is probably the worst app I have ever downloaded from the App Store which is terribly disappointing because I really like the lights themselves.

title: Don‚Äôt buy them
text: The lights are hung we can‚Äôt get them to light.  The first strand worked until we plugged in the second strand.  It tells us to update and stand near the box but even with my phone touching their controller box the controller won‚Äôt update.  I am living National Lampoons Family Vacation lighting scene. Now I have a unhappy husband who has to take down the lights and hang a different brand.

title: Getting there
text: I really like the idea of these lights. The colors look nice, they are bright, but the app needs some work. Not saying the app makes the lights unusable but not as easy as it should be. Every time you open the app you have to manually connect to your lights. Then every time you choose a light pallet you are thrown right into editing it. I think with a substantial app update these lights will be a winner.

title: Timer mode still useless
text:
Timer only works and remembers its settings if the app is left running and in the foreground and phone remains within Bluetooth connection range of string.

If Lumenplay app leaves foreground, or is stopped, or it gets out of bluetooth range, timer is forgotten.

All other functions (except timer) now appear to work as advertised. (Tested on an iPhone 4s with S4 lights plus one extender string.(firmware updated.))

title: Timer function does not work:(
text: The lights work great, however the app leaves something to be desired. The timer setting function does not work at all. In addition, the colors that are displayed on the app are not what ends up being displayed on the lights. The color orange ends up looking like yellow, so I have to adjust the color to red if I want orange. Disappointing app, but still fun to play with different designs.

title: Quit working after just a few months
text: We paid over $200 for a strand of 25 bulbs for our balcony. Quit working after just a few months. We checked the outlet, left unplugged to possibly reset, uninstalled & reinstalled app. Nothing. Will be sending these back. A strand from Target at least lasts the summer for significantly less $ even if they don't have all the bells and whistles. At least they work. We expected much more for the price. Now the burden of packing & shipping back.

title: Sleep timer mystifies me
text:
Update 8/21/15: yet another "fix" to the schedule issue. Yet another waste of time. The whole scheduling area makes no sense. Was it designed by a sadist? I feel so ripped off.

Update 1/23/15: this new release was supposed to fix the schedule issue "some" users were experiencing. I can confirm that nothing has changed and the schedule page is still a total mystery. It appears to do nothing at all. Why could they not look at, oh, I don't know, the calendar app, to get a clue how to set a start and end time? Best to avoid this whole company. Going to 1 star. 

Original review:

I like the lights OK and the app is so-so, but generally does what I need it to do. 

I really want the lights to come on and turn off at a set time. There are so many easy ways to set two times, but Lumenplay went with a page that I cannot understand. If I change the bottom scrolling time it does nothing. If I touch the top time it resets what I just scrolled to. Genuinely confused.

The app contains no help and there is no link from the web page. 

It's way overpriced for this kind of quality and I can't give it any more stars.
